nodes.text: The Rebel Air Force: Combat Airspeeders

"The Rebel Air Force: Combat Airspeeders" was an article in Challenge 47 by Whitney Weston. It introduced the AHS-1 heavy assault airspeeder and Tachyon fast-attack airspeeder to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
The Tachyon fast-attack airspeeder is similar to concept art for the T-7 airspeeder by Ralph McQuarrie.
